crates/fast-ta-experiments/src/data.rs.description: Synthetic data generators using ChaCha8Rng from rand_chacha for deterministic benchmarks. Key functions: generate_random_walk(n, seed), generate_ohlcv(n, seed), inject_nans(series, ratio, seed). OHLCV struct has validate_invariants() method for testing.

crates/fast-ta-core/src/traits.rs.description: SeriesElement trait extends num_traits::Float with additional methods for safe numeric conversions (from_usize, from_i32, from_f64). Blanket implementation covers all Float + NumCast + Copy + Default + Send + Sync types. ValidatedInput trait provides validation methods for slices and vectors.

crates/fast-ta-core/src/error.rs.description: Error enum with variants: InsufficientData(required, actual), NumericConversion(context), CyclicDependency(node_id), EmptyInput, InvalidPeriod(period, reason). Implements Display and std::error::Error. Result<T> type alias for Result<T, Error>.
